text: Julie Delpy (born 21 December 1969 in Paris) is a French-American director and movie actress. She has performed in and directed many movies during her career. She moved to the United States around 1990. She is a dual citizen of France and the United States. ==Other websites== * Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Paris Category:American movie actors Category:American movie directors Category:American movie producers Category:American screenwriters Category:American television actors Category:French movie actors Category:French screenwriters Category:French television actors Category:Movie directors from Paris Category:Movie producers from Paris Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Writers from Paris
title: Julie Delpy
